data.question: What is the chemical formula for the MOF with AMSs that showed the highest H2 sorption capacity under the conditions of 77 K and 1 atm?
Which MOF has a higher hydrogen storage capacity, those with AMSs or without?
data.answer: MOFs with AMSs have a higher hydrogen storage capacity.

data.question: True or False: The MOF [{Zn2(abtc)(dmf)2}3] is insoluble in water.
What is the effect of AMSs on the H2 adsorption capacity of MOFs?
data.answer: AMSs enhance the H2 adsorption capacity of MOFs.

data.question: What is the highest recorded H2 sorption capacity at 77 K and 1 atm among the MOFs discussed?
True or False: The MOF [{Cu2(abtc)(dmf)2}3] has no accessible metal sites (AMSs).
What is the role of AMSs in MOFs regarding gas adsorption?
data.answer: AMSs provide stronger interaction with gas molecules, enhancing adsorption.

data.question: True or False: The MOF [{Zn2(abtc)(dmf)2}3]·4 H2O·10 dmf (1) has a higher CO2 adsorption capacity than [{Cu2(abtc)}3] (2 b).
What is the zero-coverage isosteric heat of H2 adsorption for [{Cu2(abtc)}3]?
True or False: The presence of AMSs in MOFs does not affect the isosteric heat of H2 adsorption.
What synthesis condition was used for the MOF [{Zn2(abtc)(dmf)2}3]·4 H2O·10 dmf?
data.answer: Heating a dmf solution of Zn(NO3)2·6 H2O and H4abtc at 100 8C for 12 h.

data.question: True or False: The MOF [{Cu2(abtc)(H2O)2}3]·10 dmf·6 (1,4-dioxane) (2) is soluble in common organic solvents.
What is the main contributor to the higher wt % of adsorbed H2 in MOFs with AMSs?
data.answer: The lower molecular weight effect of MOFs with AMSs.

data.question: True or False: The MOF [{Cu2(abtc)}3] (2 b) has the highest CO2 uptake capacity reported to date.
What is the effect of Jahn–Teller distortion on the porosity of MOFs?
data.answer: It reduces the free space in MOFs, affecting their porosity.

data.question: True or False: The MOF [{Cu2(abtc)(dmf)2}3] (2 a) has a higher surface area and pore volume than [{Cu2(abtc)}3] (2 b).
What is the role of paddlewheel clusters in the construction of porous MOFs?
data.answer: They are used for the modular construction of porous frameworks due to their specific geometry.

data.question: True or False: The coordinated dmf molecules in the MOF [{Zn2(abtc)(dmf)2}3] block the channels parallel to the [101¯] direction.
What is the significance of the void volume in MOFs?
data.answer: It indicates the percentage of free space within the MOF structure that can accommodate guest molecules.

data.question: True or False: The MOF [{Cu2(abtc)(dmf)2}3] (2 a) and [{Cu2(abtc)}3] (2 b) have the same framework structure.
